section.heading: Hearing by court.
section.text: The court shall grant a hearing to a person whose continued hospitalization is ordered under section 21-524 , if he requests the hearing. The hearing shall be held within 24 hours after receipt of the request.

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in § 21-526 and § 24-531.07.
